soulWeapon.advancement0:
Summons the Soul of Hundred-Flavor Banquet, Tempora Fyrr for 10 sec and gains additional effects accourding to Juno's status.
While in [Cook from Heaven], increases all allies' All DEF by 50% + euqal to 3% of Juno's ATK.
While in [Cook from Hell], increases all allies' ATK by 30% + euqal to 3% of Juno's ATK.
Upon using the Skill at 2 or more stacks of [Excellent Ingredient], consumes 2 stacks and increases all effect by 50%.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Reduces Skill Activation Requirement to 5 times.
soulWeapon.advancement2:
While in [Cook from Heaven], reduces All DMG all allies take by 20%.
While in [Cook from Hell], increases All DMG all enemies take by 15%.
The effect of Excellent Ingredient stacks applies to these effects.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon using Skills 7 times.

When the skill is used again, transforms into a Cook from Heaven.

dark: At the beginning of every battle, gains 2 stacks of [Excellent Ingredient] and increases MP Recovery/Sec by 200% for 10 seconds.

profile.likes: Eating, cooking, people who enjoy her dishes

background.story: She's an ordinary young lady from the town, but her culinary skills are Orvel's finest. From the plain, wholesome food of the common people to the luxurious delicacies of the nobility, there isn't a dish she cannot cook. She once received an offer to work as the Royal Chef, but she refused it and opened an inn to let everyone enjoy her dishes. Her inn soon became one of the most famous attractions in Orvel, visited by countless adventurers. Now people call her inn 'the Hero's Inn,' and she's enjoying her life among the 'heroes.'

itemIntroductions.weapon: A magical pot known to have been used by a legendary chef in the distant past. It is made with magical metal that even Blacksmith Jin hasn't ever seen before. It has the effects of boosting the taste and aroma of the food, maximizing the natural quality of ingredients. It is such a rare treasure, but it is seldom used by its owner, Juno. As she has great pride in her culinary skills, people assume that she does not like to reply upon such magical artifacts. As a result, the most precious treasure in the culinary world is now merely a decoration in Juno's inn. When the day comes that she decides to use it, however, the world will witness a whole new level of cooking.
itemIntroductions.soul:
To prevent herself from being overly reliant on Tempora Fyrr, the legendary cooking utensil, Juno had been treating it as a decoration. One thing Juno did not notice, is that this pot had an ego.
All those who had possessed Tempora Fyrr became top chefs who brought joy and happiness to their customers, but those who were over-reliant on this legendary utensil met an undesirable end.
Hence, Tempora Fyrr wished to become a master of a true chef who does not rely on tools. Tempora Fyrr was deeply moved by Juno who was always honing her skills diligently. and finally appeared in front of her eyes.
Although Juno still has no intention of 'relying on tools' to accomplish her goals, Tempora Fyrr will pass its past cooking knowledge to Juno to help her become the top chef.
treasures: A ladle that shines with the colors of the rainbow. One day, when Juno was walking around the main street of Orvel, she found a strange ladle that Guild Merchant Kumuro dropped. She tried to return it, but Kumuro smiled and disappeared after saying that the ladle was in the hands of its rightful owner. As an avid cooking tool collector, it was a great gift for Juno. Its colors are not the only thing that sets the ladle apart from ordinary ladles, but it's actually one of the legacies of the ancient civilization. Unfortunately, Juno has yet to find out that this ladle can double the pleasure of eating any food if it's used for cooking it.

A jar that Juno in her naive days bought at a rip-off price from a suspicious merchant. The merchant told her that the jar was able to turn plain water into magical broth. He managed to demonstrate the process with his nimble hands, and successfully made her fall for it. What he didn't know, however, was that the Jar would actually become a true Jar of Happiness through Juno's amazing culinary skills. With greatly improved Juno's culinary skills and the addition of Juno's Special Seasoning, an improved version of the magical broth powder that the merchant used, the jar is now one of the most important kitchen tools in Juno's inn, producing top-notch dishes.

- Here is your order, Juno's Special! No one takes the banner in front her inn that says 'Excellent Taste! Quality Guaranteed!' seriously until they put the food in their mouths. There are very few words that do Juno's food justice. When she was asked what her secret was, she smiled and answered, - It's Juno's Special Seasoning!

An apron Juno won for winning First Place in the Continental Cooking Master Competition. It is the honorable reward presented to the best chef in all of Orvelia by the legendary chef, Amelia. Before Juno opens her restaurant every morning, she wears this apron with pride.
